summary: Results-driven QA Manager with dual IC (Individual Contributor) and leadership responsibilities in Tosca Automation. Leading a team of 10 QA professionals while actively contributing to hands-on automation scripting and testing.

Spearheading exploration and implementation of Tosca's advanced features, including agentic capabilities, to optimize team efficiency. Experienced in leveraging Tosca Server for remote script execution and serving as the primary point of contact for automation deliverables across onsite and offshore teams.

Proven track record of collaborating with cross-functional teams across US and Indonesia regions to ensure seamless delivery. Multiple-time award recipient including Ace Award, Champion Award, and Super Productivity Award from Accenture.
